'''Barrie Martin''' is an English actor. He is best known for his roles in films such as ''Exodus: Gods and Kings'', ''Into the Woods'' and ''Paddington''.

In [[Season 5]] he will portray aÂ wildling and a wight. It is unknown at this time whether Martin will portray two different characters or a wildling who then becomes a wight.<ref>[http://www.castingcallpro.com/uk/view.php?uid=456492]</ref>
